en.answer:
If your opponent's Salvage resolves, you will draw 1 card due to Shared Ride.
(Both cards are added to the hand simultaneously, therefore『a card(s) is added from the Main Deck or Graveyard to your opponent's hand』is only met once.)

If your opponent's Preparation of Rites resolves in the fashion described, you will draw 2 cards due to Shared Ride.
(The requirement to draw a card was met once when『add 1 Level 7 or lower Ritual Monster from your Deck to your hand』was applied, and then once again when『add 1 Ritual Spell from your Graveyard to your hand』was applied.)
en.question:
If my opponent activates Salvage, adding 2 WATER-Attribute monsters from their Graveyard to their hand while the effect of my Shared Ride is applying, how many cards will I draw using Shared Ride?

Additionally, if my opponent activates Preparation of Rites, adding 1 Ritual Monster from their Deck and 1 Ritual Spell from their Graveyard to their hand while the effect of my Shared Ride is applying, how many cards will I draw using Shared Ride?
en.title: If your opponent activates Salvage, or Preparation of Rites, while Shared Ride is applying, how many cards do I draw?

ja.answer:
相手の「<<5908>>」の処理が行われた場合には、自分は１枚ドローします。
（２体は同時に手札に加わっており、「<<10956>>」によるドローの条件は１度だけ満たされます。）

相手の「<<8492>>」の処理が行われた場合には、自分は２枚ドローします。
（『レベル７以下の儀式モンスター１体を手札に加える』処理で１回、その後『儀式魔法カード１枚を選んで手札に加える』処理で１回、「<<10956>>」によるドローの条件が満たされます。）
ja.question:
自分の「<<10956>>」の効果適用中に、相手が「<<5908>>」を発動し、墓地の水属性モンスター２体を手札に加えた場合、自分は「<<10956>>」の効果で何枚ドローしますか？

また、自分の「<<10956>>」の効果適用中に、相手が「<<8492>>」を発動し、デッキの儀式モンスター１体と墓地の儀式魔法カード１枚を手札に加えた場合、自分は「<<10956>>」の効果で何枚ドローしますか？
ja.title: 「<<10956>>」の適用中、相手が「<<5908>>」や「<<8492>>」を発動した場合、何枚ドローしますか？
